website_summaries.verdict: Initially introduced by Clarks in 1950, the desert cleat has appeared in many styles over the years. Today, wearers are ecstatic about the SeaVees Maslon Desert Cleat Standard as it is one of the go-to shoes for people longing for style with uncompromising comfort.Available at an affordable rate, this kick is among the versatile and trendy SeaVees sneakers that can quickly match a variety of outfits.
pros: The SeaVees Maslon Desert Cleat Standard has a stylish design that is appreciated by many customers
Others described it as a “great looking,” “nice,” and “cool” shoe
Several users attested that this pair of kicks is comfortable to wear
A user with multiple sclerosis even noted that she felt incredibly comfortable using the footwear all day as if it was customized for her brace
A few wearers lauded the shoe for its versatile silhouette that could be worn for multiple occasions
A buyer stated that the sneaker has a breathable upper which keeps the foot from bad odor
Like other fashionable sneakers with a reasonable rate, the shoe is up for grabs at a decent deal for an overrated shoe as commented by a purchaser
A tester mentioned that he didn’t regret purchasing the shoe because he can wear it with or without socks and didn’t cause him blisters
cons: A couple of reviewers expressed their dissatisfaction with the SeaVees Maslon Desert Cleat Standard's narrow fitting
One even complained that he got sore toes after wearing it all day
An individual perceived that the shoe has a thin fabric upper
The footwear has minimal padding, said by a reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but not for MSRP
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes that are also comfortable, but no way should these sell for plus $90. From a quality perspective, I would say they're worth 1/3 of that.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool shoe, fresh look, but definitely a bit large (I wear a size 9.5 in seavee's hermosa sneakers).
customer_reviews.author: graphpaper

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Photos
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is the wrong color and isn't on the listing (no big deal). Asked for an exchange only to get the wrong color again.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes, comfortable and can be worn with anything. It is my 6th pair of SeaVees, and I love them all
customer_reviews.author: Bouncer Criss

customer_reviews.title: Don't  Quit
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and I want more. In the past I find something I like and they quit making them....drag.
customer_reviews.author: Chris240

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking but very loose in the heel but snug in the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: love the style hated the fit. These were way too narrow for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After wearing it for a day my toes were pretty sore.
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is quite cramped. After wearing it for a day my toes were pretty sore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, looks great out the box
customer_reviews.text: If you've been searching for the one shoe you'd ever need this is certainly a contender. Very comfortable, looks great out the box, looks great after three years of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfy and look so good. I just wish the fabric was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfy and look so good. I just wish the fabric was a little stronger, I feel like it is a little too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel M.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for exchanging them
customer_reviews.text: Thank you you made my day the perfect size thank you for exchanging them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ya gotta check this one out!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pair along w/Chocolate pair to find that they are incredibly comfortable. Having Multiple Sclerosis/MS, I wear a brace/AFO to support one of my legs when walking. It's very hard to find shoes that accommodate the brace, fit my other foot, and are comfortable to walk in throughout the day. With this shoe having a removable sole/insert, I feel that this shoe is nearly customized for my brace. This shoe is stylish; thus, it's great for work or casual/fun wear. After years & years of trying on different types of shoes, what a wonderful find this was!!! Even if I didn't have MS, I would find this shoe very appealing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colynn D. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, hate the fit
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered my usual size and couldn't squeeze my foot into the shoe. Exchanged for a larger size, but the shoes were still painfully narrow. Possibly suitable for someone with very narrow feet and who doesn't mind minimal underfoot padding.
customer_reviews.author: Teeb

product_meta.title: Seavees Men's Maslon Casual Desert Boot
product_meta.description: These Mens SeaVees Maslon Chukka Boots are guaranteed authentic. They're crafted with , and the closure is Front Lace.
feature_bullets: Uppers made of premium poplin twill and soft suede accents
Comfort memory foam footbed lined in soft cotton featuring cooling air flow channels
Genuine gum rubber outsole provides flexibility, longer wear and softer step
Herringbone sole design offers maximum slip resistance
